titles.title: If I Could Have The World

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}If I could have the world and all it owns. A thousand kingdoms, a thousand thrones. If all the earth were mine to hold, With wealth my only goal, I’d spend my gold on selfish things. Without the love that Your life brings Just a little bit more is all I need, ‘til life was torn from me.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I’d rather be in the palm of Your hand, though rich or poor I may be. Faith can see right through the circumstances, sees the forest in spite of the trees. Your graces provides for me.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}If I should walk the streets, No place to sleep. No faith in promises You keep. I’d have no way to bring any bread With the Bible for my bed. But if I trust the One who died for me, Who shed His blood to set me free. If I live my life to trust in You, Your grace will see me through.{/lang-eng}
